titleStmt.title: Galwad ir annychweledig idroi a byw Derbyn trugaredd tra byddo trugaredd iw chael fel y myn nynt gael trugaredd yn nydd eucyfyngder. Oddiwrth y Duw byw. / Trwy ey wâs ennheilwing Richard Baxter.
Call to the unconverted. Welsh
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Tros Edward Brewster ac ydyntiw cael tan Lûn y Chryhir ym mynwent Paul,

notesStmt.note: Welsh translation of: A call to the unconverted.
Notes in ms. on [2] blank pages following text.
Imperfect: faded print with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
